secText: Vocabulary: concave mirror, convex mirror, center of curvature, diffuse reflection, focal length, focal point, image, incident ray, law of reflection, light rays, magnification, normal, object, optical illusion, plane mirror, principal axis, ray diagram, real image, reflecting telescope, reflection, specular reflection, spherical mirror aberration, virtual image, virtual ray

Language Arts Connection: Encourage students to continue recording their thoughts, questions, and vocabulary definitions and sentences in their Science Notebooks. For an explanation of how to incorporate Science Notebooks into your instruction, see Chapter 1 Overview, Part 1.

Online Flashcards Ask students to use a free online flashcard maker to write flashcards that can then be shared with the class and used for review. As a class, critique the flashcards, and have the students revise them accordingly.
